WorkItem.ClosedComment: This is __not__ an issue with PHPExcel. It is an issue with the script that is using PHPExcel
WorkItem.Description:
Hello,

When I export the file, it contains weird characters, here is a screenshot of the file that gets downloaded.
http://i.imgur.com/CTOwtl7.png 


Thanks.

Comments.Message:
I followed a guide that was made for these libraries, here is my code.
http://pastebin.com/hfcskj3y

How can I solve this? Your answer doesn't really help me very much.

Thank you.

That's not a CSV file, it's an Excel BIFF file... why did you think it was CSV?

** Closed by MarkBaker 08/04/2013 3:14

If the file is not being rendered correctly by Excel, then open it in a text editor and look for any leading or trailing whitespace characters, and BOM character as the first few bytes of the file, or any obvious PHP error messages in plaintext in the content of the file. Any or all of these can corrupt the output of the library.
